ingredients.ingredient: ¼ cup shoyu (soy and wheat soy sauce)

cookingTips: Pat water chestnuts dry before wrapping to help bacon crisp properly
Secure bacon with toothpicks to keep from unwrapping during cooking
Bake at 400°F for 20-25 minutes until bacon is crispy, turning halfway through
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How will you prevent the bacon from burning while ensuring the water chestnuts are heated through?
